Package edu.cnm.deepdive.dungeonrun.controller

Class AttemptController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.dungeonrun.controller.AttemptController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/attempts")
@ExposesResourceFor(Attempt.class)
public class AttemptController
extends Object
    AttemptController is for use with the client side to push information in the database for use in the client application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AttemptController​(AttemptService attemptService)
      Controlls the database for attempts entity.

    • Method Summary

      Body of the attempt service, to be sent over to the client side when needed.

    • Method Detail

      • leaderList

        @GetMapping(produces="application/json")
public Iterable<Attempt> leaderList​(@RequestParam
                                    int difficulty,
                                    Authentication auth)
        Sets the header to be sent over to the client for attempts.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - Is an integer set by the user which changes the size of the maze.
        auth - Needs the auth in order to make sure the connected user is legitimate.
        Returns:
        Returns the difficulty for use in the leaderboard.

      • post

        @PostMapping(produces="application/json",
             consumes="application/json")
public ResponseEntity<Attempt> post​(@RequestBody
                                    Attempt attempt,
                                    Authentication auth)
        Body of the attempt service, to be sent over to the client side when needed.
        Parameters:
        attempt - An instance of the attempt entity.
        auth - Needs the auth in order to make sure the connected user is legitimate.
        Returns:
        Returns the body of the service for use on the client side.

      • update

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}/completed",
            produces="application/json",
            consumes="application/json")
public boolean update​(@PathVariable
                      UUID id,
                      @RequestBody(required=false)
                      Boolean completed,
                      Authentication auth)
        Puts the completed attempts in the body for use on the client side.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the current attempt generated.
        completed - Returns true when the end of the maze is successfully reached.
        auth - Needs the auth in order to make sure the connected user is legitimate.
        Returns:
        Saves the attempt when it is completed for use in the leaderboard on the client side.

      • get

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}",
            produces="application/json")
public Attempt get​(@PathVariable
                   UUID id,
                   Authentication auth)
        Gets the user id to ensure the information is saved to the right path for the user.
        Parameters:
        id - Using the user id associated with the current logged in user.
        auth - Needs the auth in order to make sure the connected user is legitimate.
        Returns:
        Returns the user information or throws an exception if id is not valid.
